datatypeProperties.comment: Resource management practices in place for maintaining ecosystem health and the resource base for continual use.Does the standard include criteria to enhance conservation of forests?
The forest management plan defines the annual allowable cut.Does the standard require that the forest management plan defines the annual allowable cut?

The forest management plan defines the annual allowable exploitation of NTFP's (non-timber forest products).Does the standard require that the forest management plan defines the annual allowable exploitation of NTFP's (non-timber forest products)?

The standard requires that the forest management plan incorporates results of a consistent and reliable monitoring system.Does the standard require incorporating results of a consistent and replicable monitoring system into forest management planning?

The forest management plan considers the current conditions of the Forest Management Unit as a baseline for long term objectives.Does the standard require that the forest management plan considers the current condition of the Forest Management Unit (e.g. through baseline studies)?
The standard includes a general principle on forests.Does the standard include a general principle on forests?
The forest management plan lays out long-term objectives.Does the standard require that the forest management plan lays out long-term objectives?
Systems in place to ensure that the timber is from legal origin.Does the standard include criteria on rights to harvest timber within legally gazetted boundaries?

There are systems in place to ensure payments for harvest rights and timber including all timber harvesting related duties.Does the standard include payments for harvest rights and timber including duties related to timber harvesting?
Records on forests are maintained for a minimum of five years.Does the standard require maintenance of records on forests for a minimum of five years?
A summary of the monitoring results of forest resources and management practices is made publicly available. Does the standard require a publicly available summary of the monitoring results?
Processes in place for the monitoring of forest resources apart from regularity.Does the standard specify minimum requirements for the monitoring of forest resources apart from regularity?
Standard addresses other criteria related to forestry conversion.Does the standard address other forestry related criteria not covered above
A summary of the forest management plan is made publicly available.Does the standard require a publicly available summary of the forest management plan?
Procedures in place to prevent and/or remediate deforestation.Does the standard include requirements for the prevention and/or remediation of deforestation?
Procedures in place for the restocking of existing forests and woodlands which have been depleted.Does the standard include criteria on remedy issues after logging operations?

Practices in place for impact assessment of the conversion of existing agricultural land to non-agricultural use.Does the standard include criteria on assessing impacts of agricultural land conversion?
Does the standard include criteria on safeguards for the conversion of land or forests / the destruction of ecosystems for production?
The forest management plan includes verifiable targets for assessing progress.Does the standard require the forest management plan to include verifiable targets by which progress can be assessed?
